metadata.name: Better Together
metadata.description:
This open edition marks the end of a special year and sums up 2022 for me. My NFT journey officially began with a photograph of a solo cheetah in May 2022 and the year now ends with two young cheetahs moving forward together. The year, like many of ours, has been filled with highs and lows. Despite this, when looking back I think of the following:

Friends have been made

Opportunities have appeared

New skills have been learned

Creativity has blossomed

Resilience has been built

Confidence has grown

Patience has been developed

This photograph of two young cheetahs on the move at dusk was captured in August 2020 in the grasslands of the Little Karoo, South Africa. 

Thank you for being a part of my journey so far. Having said that, it's just begun.
